alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 09 at 11:55AM AKST until March 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and high winds occuring. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. West winds gusting to 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and blizzard conditions will continue into the evening. Conditions will improve late tonight as winds decrease.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
